pages.text: $(li)The Returning Board enchantment can be applied in a $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/straddleboard)$(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/straddleboard)Straddleboard$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment returns the $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/straddleboard)Straddleboard$(/l) to you after breaking.
pages.title: Returning Board
